block.p: ANAHEIM ANGELS--Placed RHP Troy Percival and RHP Seth Etherton on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled LHP Lou Pote and RHP Juan Alvarez from Edmonton of the PCL. BALTIMORE ORIOLES--Activated INF Mark Lewis from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned INF Carlos Casimiro to Rochester of the International League. CINCINNATI REDS--Purchased the contract of RHP John LeRoy from New Jersey of the Northern League and assigned him to Chattanooga of the Southern League. Activated RHP Osvaldo Fernandez off the 15-day disabled list and optioned him to Louisville of the International League. PITTSBURGH PIRATES--Purchased the contract of LHP Dan Serafini from Nashville of the PCL. Optioned RHP Steve Sparks to Altoona of the Eastern League.
